_sText:
It is T vs. CT, you will spawn in a stadium where you have to knife the opposite team. 
But 1 of the players on both teams are teleported to their cannon, 
and have to shoot the floor under the enemy's team.
 
Beware though, you can shoot your own team down.


(When one of the 2 teams are shot down, 
the player that controls the cannon on the losers team, will die too)


The cannons are shooting 5 different things: 
(when you fire, the cannon chooses randomly 1 of the 5 things)

Green filecase

Dryer

Rock

Computer monitor

Radiator


It is quite fun, and i hope you will think that too.

If I did not say enough please write a comment.

- Enjoy! :)
